definitions.definition: In or to all locations under discussion .
examples: He delivers the mail everywhere on this street.
We went everywhere at the school - we talked to all the teachers in their classrooms.

definitions.definition: In or to a few or more locations.
examples: We went to Europe last year and went everywhere : Berlin, Paris, London, and Madrid.
When I shop for shoes, I like to look everywhere .
I've looked everywhere in the house and still can't find my glasses.

main_definition: In or to all locations under discussion .
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial , hyperbolic ) In or to a few or more locations.
